content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment quite appealing, especially its central location. So, what price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was thinking about 400 euros per month. It's a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 400 euros per month is indeed a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. However, I'm looking to get the best deal possible for my property. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I am always open for a negotiation. What is your offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I would like to propose 450 euros per month. This is a reasonable price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its prime location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good offer, but I was hoping for something a little lower. How about 430 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 430 euros per month is an attractive price, but considering the amenities and the fact that it's a new construction, I believe 450 euros would be more appropriate. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at 440 euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 440 euros is a fair compromise. I accept your proposal. I agree to the price of [440] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement. Thank you for your time, Max. I look forward to having you as a tenant. We will proceed with the lease agreement at 440 euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
